rlFrameTrigger_t Struct Reference

Frame Trigger API parameters RL_RF_FRAMESTARTSTOP_CONF_SB. More...

#include <control/mmwavelink/include/rl_sensor.h>

Data Fields

rlUInt16_t startStop
 Start/Stop Frame
0x0000 - Stop the transmission of frames after the current frame is over
0x0001 - Trigger a frame in software triggered mode. In hardware SYNC_IN
triggered mode, this command allows subsequent SYNC_IN trigger to
be honored
.
 
rlUInt16_t reserved
 Reserved for Future use.
